ygData.subject: Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I m probably the weakest dressed level 27 bard on the Tunare server.  I have level 1 people asking why I don t have bronze--and they are wearing bronze!
ygData.messageBody:
Well,
I'm probably the weakest dressed level 27 bard on the
Tunare server. I have level 1 people asking why I
don't have bronze--and they are wearing bronze! argh!
Actually, I just don't care for the look. But here's
my list. Don't laugh.

Head: Black Iron Crown
Face: Silver Star Ruby Veil
Ears: Opalline earring and Onyx earring
Neck: Electrum Black Pearl Choker
Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle
Chest: Reserve Militia Tunic (i have banded as well
but like the look of the militia tunic even though the
stats aren't great)
Arms: Barbed Arms
Wrist 1: Bracer of Erollisi (unless I just sold it)
Wrist 2: Banded Bracer
Hands: Lambent Gauntlets (elf hide in bank)
Rings: Dervish Rings (OK, stop laughing--haven't
found a jeweler that could make me the ones I want
Back: Banded Cloak
Waist: Purity Belt
Legs: Barbed Legs
Feet: Banded Boots (the random loot for the kobold
hide hasn't hit for me yet!)

Weapons: Obsidian Scimitar, dragoon dirk. Also have a
barbed leather whip and am working on getting that
obsidian shard

Have about 300 plat in bank. So there you have it.
An untwinked bard who has been un-obsessed with
getting items. Now, I'm working on it a bit
more--sick of helping people camp for THEIR stuff.

Signed,
Thex Luteslinger (the bard who refuses to wear bronze
just cause I should)

> Message: 21
> Date: Mon, 6 Dec 1999 21:07:44 -0600
> From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>
> Subject: Re: Equipment
>
> Wow, looks like I need to go shopping!
>
> I'll post this, perhaps somewhere some level 1 bard
> will think I'm the man
> hehe!
>
> Head: Bronze Helm
> Face: Leering Mask
> Ears: Golden Amber Earrings X2
> Neck: Spiked Collar
> Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle
> Arms: Bronze Vambraces
> Wrist 1: Bracer of Erollisi
> Wrist 2: Bronze Bracer
> Hands: Lambent Gauntlets (I still keep my elf-hide
> in reserve though)
> Rings: Jagged Band, Can't remember the other, some
> wedding band or something
> +2 STR maybe?
> Back: Banded Cloak (Hehe)
> Waist: Drakescale Belt
> Legs: Lambent Greaves
> Feet: Kobold Hide Boots
>
> Weapons: Obsidian Scimitar X2, Dragoon Dirk, and my
> newly dusted off
> Obsidian Shard - thanks for the info by the way, who
> knew? A fire proc
> resisted by fire goblins? Sometimes I truly think
> I'm the slowest bard in
> Norrath.
>
> Instruments: Hand drum, lute, wodden flute, brass
> horn. I live dangerously!
>
> Money? Not a clue, not very much anymore after
> buying my lambent jewels.
>
> So there, I'll have you all know that I think the
> half smurf-half carrot
> look is going to be very in this season! At least
> you guys give us all
> something of a wish list to shoot for!
>
> Weiland
> <Disciples of Truth>
> Erollisi Marr
>
> Elwyn - If you feel inclined, throw your list up
> here. I'm curious, but
> still too timid in game to ask to inspect hehe. See
> you round!
>
